蹵字的基本解释

蹵
cù
同“蹴”。

蹵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［cù］
［《廣韻》七宿切，入屋，清。］
［《廣韻》子六切，入屋，精。］
亦作“踓2”。亦作“蹵1”。
(1)踩；踏。
(2)踢。
(3)追逐；追踪。
(4)惊惭不安貌。参见“蹴然”。
(5)方言。折。
(6)同“蹙”。促，靠近。
(7)同“蹙”。狭窄。参见“蹴尖”。
(8)同“蹙”。减缩，削弱。
(9)同“蹙”。催促。
(10)同“蹙”。聚拢，皱缩。
(11)见“蹴躇”。
[②]［zú］
［《集韻》就六切，入屋，從。］
亦作“蹵2”。
恭敬貌。参见“蹴2然”。

蹵字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　蹵； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1233第37
【玉篇】同蹴。【博雅】蹴蹋也。【史記·燕世家】王蹵之以足。　又【前漢·董仲舒傳】以蹵迫之民。又【孟子】曾西蹵然曰。【趙岐註】蹵然，猶蹵踖。【莊子·人閒世】子產蹵然攺容更貌。

蹵字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［cù］
["Guang Yun" Qi Su cut, enter the house, Qing. ]
["Guangyun" has six cuts, enters the house, and is refined. ]
Also known as "踓2". Also known as "蹵1".
(1) Step on; step on.
(2) Kick.
(3) Chasing; tracking.
(4) Panic and uneasy appearance. See "Suddenly".
(5) Dialects. fold.
(6) Same as "蹙". Nourish, get closer.
(7) Same as "蹙". narrow. See "Jianjian".
(8) Same as "蹙". Reduce, weaken.
(9) Same as "蹙". Urge.
(10) Same as "蹙". Gather, shrink.
(11) See "knee".
[②]［zú］
["Jiyun" has six cuts, enter the house, follow. ]
Also known as "蹵2".
Respectful appearance. See "Ke 2 Ran".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Youth Collection】【Foot Character Department】　蹵; Kangxi Strokes: 19; Page Number: Page 1233 Page 37
【Jade articles】Same step. [Bo Ya] Kick also. 【Historical Records·Yan Family】Wang Kezhi has enough.　[Previous Han·Dong Zhongshu Biography] In order to destroy the forced people. [Mencius] Zeng Xi suddenly said. [Zhao Qi's Note] It's awkward and still awkward. [Zhuangzi·Renxian Shi] The son's birth looks more beautiful.
